senses.synonym: 06873227-n (a note that alternates rapidly with another note a semitone above it);07148185-n (the articulation of a consonant (especially the consonant `r') with a rapid flutter of the tongue against the palate or uvula; \""he pronounced his R's with a distinct trill\"");01052768-v (sing or play with trills, alternating with the half note above or below);01057138-v (pronounce with a trill, of the phoneme `r'; \""Some speakers trill their r's\""
